text: The triplewart seadevil (Cryptopsaras couesii) is a species of anglerfish in the family Ceratiidae. It is the only species of the genus Cryptopsaras. == Description == === Physical appearance === Female triplewart seadevils have a long body. It has a bioluminescent organ, the esca, on its head. Adult females have jet-black skin while juveniles are dark brown. === Sexual dimorphism === Triplewart seadevils exhibit extreme sexual dimorphism, where males parasitize females. == References == Category:IUCN Red List least concern species Category:Bioluminescent animals Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Triplewart seadevil
